item.title: CVE-2024-44047|2024-09-18T14:40:44.614Z -- idx%20broker -- impress%20for%20idx%20broker
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in IDX Broker IMPress for IDX Broker allows Stored XSS.This issue affects IMPress for IDX Broker: from n/a through 3.2.2.
